jgame

Interface GPaintable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GButton, GContainer, GMessage, GObject, GParallax, GParallax.GTiledSprite, GRootContainer, GSprite

    public interface GPaintable
    Any object that can be painted in a game.
    Author:
    William Chargin

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isVisible()
      Determines whether this object is visible.
      void paint(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
      Paints the object given the specified graphics context.
      void preparePaint(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
      Prepares the canvas for painting by performing any necessary modifications to the graphics context.

    • Method Detail

      • isVisible

        boolean isVisible()
        Determines whether this object is visible. Neither an invisible object nor its children will be painted.
        Returns:
        true if this object is visible, or false if it is not

      • paint

        void paint(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
        Paints the object given the specified graphics context.
        Parameters:
        g - the graphics context on which to paint

      • preparePaint

        void preparePaint(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
        Prepares the canvas for painting by performing any necessary modifications to the graphics context.
        Parameters:
        g - the graphics context to prepare
